Verses: 1 pinbu Dhaaveedhuraajaa Sabaiyaar Ellaaraiyum Nokki: Dhevan Therindhukonda En Kumaaranaagiya Saalomon Innum Vaalibanum Ilaignanumaayirukkiraan; Seyyavendiya Velaiyo Periyadhu; Adhu Oru Manushanukku Alla, Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkuk Kattum Aramanai.

2 naan Ennaale Iyandramattum En Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkendru Ponvelaikkup Ponnaiyum, Vellivelaikku Velliyaiyum, Venkalavelaikku Venkalaththaiyum, Irumbuvelaikku Irumbaiyum, Maravelaikku Maraththaiyum, Padhikkappadaththakka Kaandhiyulla Karkalaiyum, Palavarunak Karkalaiyum, Vilaiyerappetra Sagalavidha Raththinangalaiyum, Venkarpaalangalaiyum, Komedhaga Mudhaliya Karkalaiyum Eraalamaaga Savadhariththen.

3 innum En Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththinmel Naan Vaiththirukkira Vaanjaiyinaal, Parisuththa Aalayaththukkaaga Naan Savadhariththa Anaiththaiyum Thavira, Enakku Sondhamaana Ponnaiyum Velliyaiyum En Dhevanudaiya Aalayaththukkendru Kodukkiren.

4 araigalin Suvargalai Mooduvadharkaagavum, Ponvelaikkup Ponnum, Vellivelaikku Velliyum Undaayirukkiradharkaagavum, Kammaalar Seyyumvelai Anaiththirkaagavuma, Oppeerin Thangamaagiya Moovaayiram Thaalandhu Thangaththaiyum, Suththa Velliyaagiya Ezhaayiram Thaalandhu Velliyaiyum Kodukkiren.
5 ippodhum Ungalil Indraiyadhinam Karththarukkuth Than Kaikkaanikkaigalai Seluththa Manappoorvamaanavargal Yaar Endraan.
6 appozhudhu Vamsangalin Prabukkalum, Isravel Koththirangalin Prabukkalum, Aayiramperukku Adhipadhigalum, Nooruperukku Adhipadhigalum, Raajaavin Velaikkaararaagiya Prabukkalum Manappoorvamaai,

7 dhevanudaiya Aalayaththu Velaikku Aiyaayiram Thaalandhu Ponnaiyum, Padhinaayiram Thangakkaasaiyum, Padhinaayiram Thaalandhu Velliyaiyum, Padhinennaayiram Thaalandhu Venkalaththaiyum, Latcham Thaalandhu Irumbaiyum Koduththaargal.
8 yaar Kaiyil Raththinangal Irundhadho, Avargal Avaigalaiyum Karththarudaiya Aalayaththup Pokkishaththirkendru Kersoniyanaana Yegiyelin Kaiyile Koduththaargal.
9 ippadi Manappoorvamaaik Koduththadharkaaga Janangal Sandhoshappattaargal; Uththama Irudhayaththode Urchaagamaaik Karththarukkuk Koduththaargal; Dhaaveedhu Raajaavum Migavum Sandhoshappattaan.

10 aagaiyaal Dhaaveedhu Sabai Anaiththin Kangalukku Munbaagavum Karththarukku Sthoththiram Seluththi Sonnadhu: Engal Thagappanaagiya Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Sadhaakaalangalilum Dhevareerukku Sthoththiram Undaavadhaaga.

11 karththaave, Maatchimaiyum Vallamaiyum Magimaiyum Jeyamum Magaththuvamum Ummudaiyavaigal; Vaanaththilum Boomiyilum Ullavaigalellaam Ummudaiyavaigal; Karththaave, Raajyamum Ummudaiyadhu; Dhevareer Ellaarukkum Thalaivaraai Uyarndhirukkireer.

12 aisuvariyamum Ganamum Ummaale Varugiradhu; Dhevareer Ellaavatraiyum Aalugiravar; Ummudaiya Karaththile Saththuvamum Vallamaiyum Undu; Evaraiyum Menmaippaduththavum Balappaduththavum Ummudaiya Karaththinaal Aagum.
13 ippodhum Engal Dhevane, Naangal Umakku Sthoththiram Seluththi, Umadhu Magimaiyulla Naamaththaith Thudhikkirom.
14 ippadi Manappoorvamaaik Kodukkum Thiraani Undaavadharku Naan Emmaaththiram? En Janangal Emmaaththiram? Ellaam Ummaal Undaanadhu; Umadhu Karaththile Vaangi Umakkuk Koduththom.

15 umakku Munbaaga Naangal Engaludaiya Pidhaakkal Ellaaraippolum Aradhesigalum Paradhesigalumaayirukkirom; Boomiyinmel Engal Naatkal Oru Nizhalaippola Irukkiradhu; Nilaiththiruppom Ennum Nambikkaiyillai.

16 engal Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummudaiya Parisuththa Naamaththirkendru Umakku Oru Aalayaththaik Kattugiradharku, Naangal Savadhariththirukkira Indhapporulgal Ellaam Umadhu Karaththilirundhu Vandhadhu; Ellaam Ummudaiyadhu.

17 en Dhevane, Neer Irudhayaththai Sodhiththu, Uththama Gunaththil Piriyamaayirukkireer Enbadhai Ariven; Ivaiyellaam Naan Uththama Irudhayaththode Manappoorvamaaik Koduththen; Ippozhudhu Ingeyirukkira Ummudaiya Janamum Umakku Manappoorvamaaik Kodukkiradhaik Kandu Sandhoshiththen.

18 aabiragaam Eesaakku Isravel Ennum Engal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Umadhu Janaththin Irudhayaththil Undaana Indha Sindhaiyaiyum Ninaivaiyum Endraikkum Kaaththu, Avargal Irudhayaththai Umakku Neraakkiyarulum.

19 en Kumaaranaagiya Saalomon Ummudaiya Karpanaigalaiyum Ummudaiya Saatchigalaiyum Ummudaiya Kattalaigalaiyum Kaikkollumpadikkum, Ivaigal Ellaavatraiyum Seydhu, Naan Aayaththampannina Indha Aramanaiyaikkattumpadikkum, Avanukku Uththama Irudhayaththaith Thandharulum Endraan.

20 adhinpinbu Dhaaveedhu Sabai Anaiththaiyum Nokki: Ippodhu Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Sthoththiriyungal Endraan; Appozhudhu Sabaiyaar Ellaarum Thangal Pidhaakkalin Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Sthoththiriththu, Thalai Kunindhu Karththaraiyum Raajaavaiyum Panindhukondu,

21 karththarukkup Paliyittu, Marunaalile Sarvaanga Thaganapaligalaaga Aayiram Kaalaigalaiyum, Aayiram Aattukkadaakkalaiyum, Aayiram Aattukkuttigalaiyum, Avaigalukkaduththa Paanapaligalaiyum Isravel Anaiththirkaagavum Karththarukku Seluththinaargal.

22 avargal Andraiyadhinam Migundha Sandhoshaththodu Karththarukku Munbaagap Pojanabaanampanni, Dhaaveedhin Kumaaranaagiya Saalomonai Irandaamvisai Raajaavaakki, Karththarukku Munbaaga Avanai Adhipadhiyaagavum, Saadhokkai Aasaariyanaagavum Abishegampanninaargal.

23 appadiye Saalomon Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Sthaanaththile, Karththarudaiya Singaasanaththil Raajaavaai Veetrirundhu Paakkiyasaaliyaayirundhaan; Isravelar Ellaarum Avanukkuk Keezhppadindhirundhaargal.
24 sagala Prabukkalum Paraakkiramasaaligalum Dhaaveedhu Raajaavinudaiya Sagala Kumaararunkooda Raajaavaagiya Saalomonukku Adangiyirundhaargal.
25 isravelar Ellaarum Kaanak Karththar Saalomonai Migavum Periyavanaakki, Avanukku Munne Isravelil Raajaavaana Oruvanukkum Illaadhirundha Raajariga Magaththuvaththai Avanukkuk Kattalaiyittaar.
26 ivvidhamaai Eesaayin Kumaaranaagiya Dhaaveedhu Isravel Anaiththukkum Raajaavaayirundhaan.
27 avan Isravelai Arasaanda Naatkal Naarpadhuvarusham; Epronile Ezhuvarushamum, Erusalemile Muppaththumoondru Varushamum Raajaavaayirundhaan.
28 avan Theerkkaayusum Aisuvariyamum Magimaiyumullavanaai Nalla Mudhirvayadhile Maranamadaindhapin, Avan Kumaaranaagiya Saalomon Avan Sthaanaththile Arasaandaan.

29 dhaaveedhu Raajaavinudaiya Aadhiyodandhamaana Nadapadigalum, Avan Arasaanda Vibaramum, Avanudaiya Vallamaiyum, Avanukkum Isravelukkum, Andhandha Dhesangalin Raajyangal Anaiththukkum Nadandha Kaalasambavangalum,
30 gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Saamuvelin Prabandhaththilum, Theerkkadharisiyaagiya Naaththaanin Prabandhaththilum, Gnaanadhrushtikkaaranaagiya Kaaththin Prabandhaththilum Ezhudhiyirukkiradhu.
